text: Tini sahare prabesa karalena, yakhana tara adhibasira chila bekhabara. Tathaya tini du'i byaktike lara'irata dekhalena. Edera ekajana chila tamra nija dalera ebam an'ya jana tamra satru dalera. Atahpara ye tamra nija dalera se tamra satru dalera lokatira birud'dhe tamra kache sahayya prarthana karala. Takhana musa take ghusi maralena ebam ete'i tara mrtyu haye gela. Musa balalena, eta sayatanera kaja. Niscaya se prakasya satru, bibhrantakari.
